  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class ChatApp

      class ChatApp extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • chatArea
          ColoredTextPane chatArea
          ColoredTextPane containing all the messages
        • chatScrollPane
          JScrollPane chatScrollPane
          ScrollPane to allow scrolling inside the chatarea
        • communicationWithServer
          Server communicationWithServer
          Server stub to send messages to the server
        • inputField
          JTextField inputField
          input field for the message to send
        • shiftIsPressed
          Boolean shiftIsPressed
          boolean variable to know if shift is pressed, because when shift is pressed, Enter is cancelled.
        • user
          Info_itf_Impl user
          informations about the user who called this gui
        • username
          String username
          Username, the same as in user, but as a String, for clearer manipulation

    • Class ColoredTextPane

      class ColoredTextPane extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • colorSet
          Color[] colorSet
          Current colorSet, either night or day
        • insideBorder
          JPanel insideBorder
          Only exists to have two borders in one panel
        • lightColors
          Color[] lightColors
          Text, Error, valid, whisper, background Whisper is never used because we did not have the time to implement private messages. light colors are for the light theme, used by the chat app
        • lightMode
          boolean lightMode
          True if lightmode is active, used to switch between light and night
        • nightColors
          Color[] nightColors
          Text, Error, valid, whisper, background Whisper is never used because we did not have the time to implement private messages. night colors are for the night theme, used by the server app
        • tPane
          JTextPane tPane
          JTextPane containing all the messages

    • Class Info_itf_Impl

      class Info_itf_Impl extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • ID
          String ID
          identifier of the user to avoid spoofing and prove he really is the user
        • name
          String name
          username of the user
